summary: More Blocking perks for 200 skill cap
descriptionHtml:
DOWNLOAD THIS: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7891

Just another perk mod of mine. More Block perks for 200 skill cap.

You need Skyrim Script Extender and Dragon Script to reset your perks and try new perks.
[b]SKSE latest version:[/b] http://skse.silverlock.org/
[b]Script Dragon latest version:[/b] http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon
[b]Paid Perk Reset latest version:[/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3665

My settings of Elys Uncapper are included in file. Just copy all of them to your Data folder.

Always use this with a difficulty mod (Wars in Skyrim, Deadly Dragons, Intensive Difficulty and their Hardcore settings! :)

[b][color=red]10 ranks of Shield Wall perks:[/color][/b] [b]25/30/35/40/45/50/55/60/65%[/b] more effective block.

[b][color=red]2 ranks of Quick Reflexes:[/color][/b] Time slows down [b]2/4[/b] seconds if you\'re blocking during an enemy\'s power attack.

[b][color=red]Deflect Arrows:[/color][/b] [CHANGED] In vanilla, this perk is bugged (you still receive damage from arrows when blocking with a shield), but i fixed it: Now, when you unlock this perk, [b]all of your body parts will be invulnerable to arrows only when blocking with your shield.[/b] No other ranks because nothing to add. [b](Changed skill requirement to 60)[/b]

[b][color=red]2 ranks of Elemental Protection:[/color][/b] [b]50/75%[/b] reduced fire-frost-shock damage.

[b][color=red]Block Runner[/color][/b] Just changed skill requirement to [b]90[/b], nothing more to change, it just activates an animation.

[b][color=red]Power Bash:[/color][/b] Same as Block Runner, no change, because nothing to change, it just activates an animation.

[b][color=red]2 ranks of Deadly Bash:[/color][/b] [b]5x/10x[/b] more bash damage.

[b][color=red]2 ranks of Disarming Bash:[/color][/b] [b]50/75%[/b] chance to disarm the enemy when power bashing.

[b][color=red]2 ranks of Shield Charge:[/color][/b] First rank is remain unchanged, but when you get second rank Shield Charge will more effective to people around you (it has a \"cloak\" value in game files so yes; second rank will increase it\'s area of effect by [b]2x[/b] and that\'s mean you can throw up your enemies from a bit more far distance :)

I\'ve tested all perks but all we\'re human, we can make mistakes, so if you find any bugs or anything like this, let me know as soon as possible, so I can try to fix it. And sorry for my English, because it isn\'t my main language. Thanks.
